author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-United Technologies Plans To Hire 35,000 People And Make $15 Bln Investment In U.S. Over Next Five Years
text:
May 23 (Reuters) - United Technologies Corp:
* UNITED TECHNOLOGIES PLANS TO HIRE 35,000 PEOPLE AND MAKE $15 BILLION INVESTMENT IN U.S. OVER NEXT FIVE YEARS
* UNITED TECHNOLOGIES - ABOUT $9 BILLION OF $15 BILLION INVESTMENT IN U.S. OVER NEXT 5 YEARS IS EXPECTED TO GO TOWARDS RESEARCH AND DEVELOPMENT
* UNITED TECHNOLOGIES - ABOUT $6 BILLION OF $15 BILLION INVESTMENT IN U.S. OVER NEXT 5 YEARS IS EXPECTED TO GO TOWARDS CAPEX INITIATIVES Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
